section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication:
www.primet.org 
 
Lobbying EU, and national politicians and officials, attending conferences and meetings, responding to questionnaires and consultations, engaging withthe digital economy.
goals__remit:
The principal activity of the company is to be the main federal trade organisation open to all companies with an operational base in Europe within the private sector of the economy that provides value added meteorological and climatological services to end users or distributors. PRIMET seeks to pursue actions that it believes will result in economic growth and facilitate competition on equal commercial terms within the data supply chain (particularly in respect of Public Sector Information) for all those operating in its members’ market of interest.  
 
The company is run on a not-for-profit basis.
